verbs.description: [ARG0: Sen. Bernie Sanders , Chuck Schumer , Rep. Adam Schiff , and other Democrats all] [V: blasted] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's decision to reverse sanctions on Chinese telecom giant ZTE] .
Sen. Bernie Sanders , Chuck Schumer , Rep. Adam Schiff , and other Democrats all blasted President Donald Trump 's decision to [V: reverse] [ARG1: sanctions on Chinese telecom giant ZTE] .
